product_name: Kenra ProfessionalTravel Size Platinum Dry Texture Spray 6
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeKenra Platinum Dry Texture Spray 6 increases texture and fullness while absorbing oils and impurities. This ultra-lightweight, non-drying formulation provides flexible hold with a matte finish.
details: DetailsBenefitsIncreases texture & fullnessAbsorbs oils & impuritiesUltra-lightweight, non-drying formulationItem 2533553How To UseShake well. Apply evenly throughout dry hair from roots to ends. Reapply after styling for flexible hold.Precautions: Flammable. Contents under pressure. Do not place in hot water or near radiators, stoves or other sources of heat. Do not puncture or incinerate container or store at temperatures over 120 F. Do not use in presence of open flame or spark. Avoid fire, flame and smoking during use and until hair is thoroughly dry. Use only as directed. Intentional misuse by deliberately concentrating and inhaling contents can be harmful or fatal. Keep out of reach of children. First aid treatment: spray in a well-ventilated area. If adverse reaction occurs on skin or scalp, discontinue use and consult a physician. In case of accidental contact with eyes-rinse for 15 minutes. Consult a physician if problem persists.IngredientsHydrofluorocarbon 152A, SD Alcohol 40b (Alcohol Denat.), Dimethyl Ether, Propylene Glycol, Polyurethane-14, Amp-Acrylates Copolymer, Glycerin, Tapioca Starch Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Silica, Fragrance (Parfum), PEG-12 Dimethicone, Polysilicone-15, PEG/PPG-17-18 Dimethicone.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.
how_to_use: Shake well. Apply evenly throughout dry hair from roots to ends. Reapply after styling for flexible hold.Precautions: Flammable. Contents under pressure. Do not place in hot water or near radiators, stoves or other sources of heat. Do not puncture or incinerate container or store at temperatures over 120 F. Do not use in presence of open flame or spark. Avoid fire, flame and smoking during use and until hair is thoroughly dry. Use only as directed. Intentional misuse by deliberately concentrating and inhaling contents can be harmful or fatal. Keep out of reach of children. First aid treatment: spray in a well-ventilated area. If adverse reaction occurs on skin or scalp, discontinue use and consult a physician. In case of accidental contact with eyes-rinse for 15 minutes. Consult a physician if problem persists.

reviews.headline: Will buy again
reviews.comments: I love this stuff! Works well, smells good.

reviews.headline: Faulty canisters
reviews.comments: The priduct itself is great. However, this is the second travel size spray I have received where the aerosol can stops working after one or two uses. Because it's the tracker size and not used as frequently as a full sized it's passed any return windows. So I've basically just flushed money down the drain because the canister on the travel size has been faulty twice.

reviews.headline: Dulled hair
reviews.comments: My hair is vey fine and thinning.the texture is combination. Bought this produce to give my hair texture. It did ok but made my hair very dull.

reviews.headline: Works well for me.
reviews.comments: All the negative reviews surprises me. I personally recommend this product.  I have fine hair and appreciate how this product works. Texture does make your hair feel different so expect that. I've gotten compliments on how my hair smells with this. TRY IT.  However,  if your picky about smells - spray in store to spare us another negative review about the smell. ðŸ™„

reviews.headline: Works well for me.
reviews.comments: All the negative reviews surprises me. I personally recommend this product.  I have fine hair and appreciate how this product works. Texture does make your hair feel different so expect that. I've gotten compliments on how my hair smells with this. TRY IT.  However,  if your picky about smells - spray in store to spare us another negative review about the smell. ðŸ™„

reviews.headline: Works well
reviews.comments: I used this on my curls after using my shark air wrap and it held them nicely. The only thing I didn't like was it left product build up by the end of day 2.

reviews.headline: Great product.  Loge the scent
reviews.comments: Love the product.  Gives my hair volume and I love the scent.

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: adds volumes, will definitely buy the full size after trying

reviews.headline: Sticky
reviews.comments: Now I remember why I stopped using the brand. Products leave hair feeling sticky and weighs down my fine hair

reviews.headline: I will buy again
reviews.comments: Great product. I will buy bigger size next time

reviews.headline: Great Kenra product
reviews.comments: I have used this Platinum Dry Texture spray for a long time. It gives my hair some extra volume and texture without being heavy. I was happy to find this travel size!

reviews.headline: Go to!
reviews.comments: All time fav!!

reviews.headline: I will continue to use this product over and over.
reviews.comments: Great for thin ,fine hair. Does not weight hair down and give lots of fullness. Great product.

reviews.headline: Burnt/Fried Hair!!!!
reviews.comments: I do not recommend this product at all! I was trying something new since I have fine hair and heard good things about this brand and I will never use their products again! It instantly melted/burned my hair off!!! I followed the instructions on the bottle you can use before and after styling, I even let it dry before using my hair. I went to cosmetology school and so this is not something new to me just was trying a different product and I do not recommend at all.

reviews.headline: Love this brand.
reviews.comments: I have learned through the years of using specific Kendra products, I hate going without.  I am thrilled that Ulta carries and Kenra makes travel size products in the products I love and use the most.

reviews.headline: No, not what I was looking for.
reviews.comments: The smell is great. I have fine hair and need lift and volume that doesn't need to be constantly touched to keep it activated.

reviews.headline: No
reviews.comments: Too sticky

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: The Kenra Dry Texture Spray 6 gives my hair so much body and fullness. That's what I'm looking for. I just love it!

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: Difficult to find but located a travel size on the top shelf.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again and again
reviews.comments: New haircut, edgy/layers..but have fine hair, this product has been a lifesaver

properties.name: Describe Yourself

values.label: 60+ woman with fine, straight short hair.

display_values: 60+ woman with fine, straight short hair.

properties.name: Pros

values.label: great for adding texture to fine hair

display_values: great for adding texture to fine hair

media.headline: I would buy this product again.

faceoff_positive.comments: Was using living proof and decided to give this a try as it is a little cheaper and wasn't disappointed. Give good lift/volume and hold at the same. I lift up sections of hair and spray towards roots. Use sparingly as I put too much in one spot and it got sticky. Also the smell is pretty strong too, only reason why I gave it 4 stars. Will start buying this over the living proof texturizing spray.
faceoff_positive.headline: Good volume

faceoff_negative.comments: This product is terrible. It's very thick and sticky, leaves my hair feeling very heavy. And the smell is awful. I would not use this product again even if I had received it for free. Save your money and try a different brand. I typically use the Fave 4 Hair (order this product in a pinch) and it is hands down 100 times better!
faceoff_negative.headline: Never

rollup.name: Travel Size Platinum Dry Texture Spray 6
